data.title: Blue Coat Systems
data.meta_description: Blue Coat Systems - Free download as Text File (.txt), PDF File (.pdf) or read online for free. Blue Coat Systems is a cybersecurity company headquartered in Sunnyvale, California that was founded in 1996 as Cacheflow, focusing on caching appliances. It later shifted focus to internet security appliances and was renamed Blue Coat Systems in 2002. Blue Coat provides hardware, software, and services for network management and cybersecurity. It was acquired by Symantec in 2016 in a $4.65 billion deal.
